sense.def:
Z besedo
even
poudarimo, da je tisto, kar v stavku stoji spredaj ali zadaj, presenetljivo.

seg.quote: She liked him even when she was quarrelling with him.
I often lend her money even now.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
even so
napovemo presenetljivo dejstvo, povezano s tistim, kar smo pravkar povedali.

seg.quote: Their feathers are regularly shed and renewed. Even so they need constant care.

sense.def:
Prislov
even
uporabljamo s primerniki pridevnikov zaradi poudarka.

seg.quote: Barber had something even worse to tell me.
I must be even more tired than I thought.

sense.def:
Izraz
even if
ali
even though
pove, da zaradi določenega dejstva preostanek naše izjave ni neresničen.

seg.quote: Even if you disagree with her, she's worth listening to.
I was always rather afraid of men, even though I had lots of boyfriends.

sense.def:
Če je neka velikost ali stopnja
even
, ostaja na približno enaki ravni.

seg.quote: Mary was breathing quietly and evenly.

sense.def:
Površine, ki so
even
, so gladke in ravne.

Delitev, ki je
even
, je taka, da vsaka prizadeta oseba, skupina ali območje dobi enako količino.

seg.quote: The distribution of land was much more even than in Latin America.
Opinion seems to be fairly evenly divided.

sense.def:
Če je natečaj ali tekmovanje
even
, so vsi udeleženci enako spretni.

seg.quote: It was a pretty even game.
Government and rebel soldiers are evenly matched.

sense.def:
To get even with someone
pomeni, da nekomu želimo storiti nekaj slabega, ker je tudi on nam storil nekaj slabega;

cit.quote: maščevati se, vrniti komu milo za drago

seg.quote: I always knew that one day I would get even with her.

sense.def:
Kadar je možnost, da se nekaj zgodi,
even
, je enako verjetno, da se bo tisto zgodilo ali da se tisto ne bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: She would have had only an even chance of being saved.

sense.def:
Število, ki je
even
, je možno deliti s številom dve.

Kadar neka količina
evens out
ali kadar nekdo
evens it out
, postaja bolj enakomerno razporejena ali bolj stalna.

seg.quote: Irrigation systems help to even out the supply of water over the growing season.
